title: Database Management Systems (DBMS)
introduction: DBMS is software for creating and managing databases. Understanding database concepts is crucial for backend development and data management.

topics.name: Indexing
topics.description: B-trees, hash indexing, and performance optimization

topics.name: Joins
topics.description: INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL OUTER joins

concepts.name: Primary Key
Foreign Key
concepts.description: Reference to primary key in another table

examples.title: JOIN Query
examples.code:
SELECT s.name, c.course_name
FROM Students s
INNER JOIN Enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id
INNER JOIN Courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id
WHERE s.name LIKE 'A%';
